original_query: Query 1: Whats the latest between India and Pakistan. Recommend to call duckduckgo and url to text tool in a single function to speed up things

summary1.text: Following the Pahalgam terror attack that killed 26, including a Nepalese national, India-Pakistan tensions have escalated. The Resistance Front (TRF), a proxy of Hafiz Saeed's Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT), initially claimed responsibility. PM Modi has granted the armed forces complete freedom regarding their response, as affirmed in a high-level meeting attended by Rajnath Singh, CDS Anil Chauhan, and the chiefs of the armed forces. A separate high-level meeting, chaired by home secretary Govind Mohan, included heads of paramilitary forces like BSF (Daljit Singh Chaudhary), NSG (Brighu Srinivasan), Assam Rifles (Vikas Lakhera) and SSB (Anupama Nilekar Chandra). Firing across the Line of Control (LoC) has entered its fifth consecutive day in areas opposite Kupwara, Baramulla, and the Akhnoor sector, with the Indian Army retaliating.

summary2.text: [error] 'charmap' codec can't encode characters in position 0-1: character maps to <undefined>

The Resistance Front (TRF), believed to be a proxy of Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT), initially claimed responsibility. PM Modi has given the armed forces complete autonomy in their response, a decision affirmed in a high-level meeting. Firing across the Line of Control (LoC) has continued for five days in areas opposite Kupwara, Baramulla, and the Akhnoor sector, with the Indian Army retaliating. An attempt to summarize a Reuters article encountered a character encoding error.

summary1.text: Following the Pahalgam terror attack that killed 26, including a Nepalese national, India-Pakistan tensions have escalated. The Resistance Front (TRF), a proxy of Hafiz Saeed's Lashkar-e-Taiba (LeT), initially claimed responsibility. PM Modi has granted the armed forces complete freedom regarding their response, as affirmed in a high-level meeting attended by Rajnath Singh, CDS Anil Chauhan, and the chiefs of the armed forces. A separate high-level meeting, chaired by home secretary Govind Mohan, included heads of paramilitary forces like BSF (Daljit Singh Chaudhary), NSG (Brighu Srinivasan), Assam Rifles (Vikas Lakhera) and SSB (Anupama Nilekar Chandra). Firing across the Line of Control (LoC) has entered its fifth consecutive day in areas opposite Kupwara, Baramulla, and the Akhnoor sector, with the Indian Army retaliating.
